name: 胡同來
objective:
本課程目的為學生訂定出研討主題，透過教授所開的書目及論文，與學生自己尋找的素材，由學生採取主動的角度去探討該主題，並與教授做定期或不定期討論，在此過程中培育出研究能力。
This Course is designed to enable advanced students to investigate a specific topic of interest in greater depth than is possible in a traditional classroom environment. Student and advisor must work together to provide direction for the study and to insure its success.
